leftSection_5.title: Simplify UBO Compliance with Our 4-Step Solution

items.question: What is an Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO)?
items.answer: A UBO is the natural person who ultimately owns or controls a company, typically someone holding 25% or more ownership or controlling key decisions.

items.question: Who needs to file UBO information in the UAE?
items.answer: All Mainland and Free Zone companies — including LLCs, partnerships, and certain offshore entities — are required to submit accurate UBO details to authorities.

items.question: How long does the UBO filing process take?
items.answer: With One Nexuz, most filings are completed within a few business days once you provide all the necessary documents.

items.question: What happens if I don’t file my UBO information?
items.answer: Failure to submit UBO filings can result in fines, license suspensions, or even legal penalties. Our experts help you ensure regulatory requirements and timely filings.

items.question: Is my personal information secure with One Nexuz?
items.answer: Absolutely! We adhere to strict data protection standards to safeguard all sensitive business and personal information.
